code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./Results.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Results=_ref=>{let{results}=_ref;const[visibleResults,setVisibleResults]=useState(25);const showMoreResults=()=>{setVisibleResults(prevVisibleResults=>prevVisibleResults+25);};const getDomain=url=>{try{const domain=new URL(url).hostname.replace("www.","");return domain;}catch(e){return null;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"results",children:[results.slice(0,visibleResults).map(result=>{const domain=getDomain(result.link);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:result.link||"#",target:result.link?"_blank":"self",rel:result.link?"noreferrer":"",className:"result-item-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"result-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"result-title",children:result.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"result-domain",children:domain?"Source: ".concat(domain):"No source available"})]})},result.question_id);}),visibleResults<results.length&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"show-more",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:showMoreResults,children:"Show More"})})]});};export default Results;
